When using Cover„ÄÅ Cover+:

 ‚Ä¢ Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV

After using Cover„ÄÅ Cover+: 
 ‚Ä¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack) for 5 turns

When using BRV Attack„ÄÅ BRV Attack+:
 ‚Ä¢ Slight BRV damage boost
passives.short_desc: Blade Block Extension: Boost to Blade Block

passive.name: Iron Will
